item.title: Foxden B&B
item.dc:creator: harry
item.description: Built on WordPress, this website showcases the B&B, its rooms, amenities, food menus, guest reviews and, most importantly, features a booking calendar for both rooms in which users can pay for their bookings using PayPal.
item.content:encoded: Built on WordPress, this website showcases the B&B, its rooms, amenities, food menus, guest reviews and, most importantly, features a booking calendar for both rooms in which users can pay for their bookings using PayPal.

item.title: DRSSA Website Re-Development
item.dc:creator: harry
item.description: Project managing, re-designing and re-developing the DRSSA website rebuild from Silverstripe CMS to WordPress The DRSSA website rebuild featured: A highly engaging home page to direct users to other areas of the website A detailed landing page showcasing all programs which accompanied a filtering system to allow people to find programs to match the member’s …
item.content:encoded:
Project managing, re-designing and re-developing the DRSSA website rebuild from Silverstripe CMS to WordPress

The DRSSA website rebuild featured:

  • A highly engaging home page to direct users to other areas of the website
  • A detailed landing page showcasing all programs which accompanied a filtering system to allow people to find programs to match the member’s interests
  • A video gallery which automatically extracted from the DRSSA YouTube channel
  • Engaging testimonials from member’s showcasing their experience with DRSSA
  • An events calendar to showcase all upcoming events to members and non-members
  • A blog to display all recent updates from the organisation
  • A secure donation system linking with Eway Australia allowing DRSSA to accept donations online across Australia

item.title: Flambouro Philanthropic Society
item.dc:creator: harry
item.description: View Project As a member of the Flambouro Philanthropic Society through family ties, I was contracted to build a website for the Flambouro community of Adelaide based in Glenelg. Built on WordPress, the website features the history of the society, the village of Flambouro and the committee, showcasing the latest news and events held at …
item.content:encoded:
View Project

As a member of the Flambouro Philanthropic Society through family ties, I was contracted to build a website for the Flambouro community of Adelaide based in Glenelg.

Built on WordPress, the website features the history of the society, the village of Flambouro and the committee, showcasing the latest news and events held at the hall, and, securely via Square, collect donations online, allow people to book the hall for their own functions and pay the booking fee online and purchase tickets to dances.
